ABOUT_US.ABOUT_US: Sabona kunesidingo sokuba kube nolimi olwengeziwe emphakathini waseNingizimu Afrika, ezweni elikhula ngokushesha lezokuxhumana kubalulekile ukwazi ulimi olwengeziwe, sabona ukuthi uma izingane ziluthola besebancane, ngabe sinikeza banethuba lokuba nentshisekelo yesiFulentshi njengoba bekhula. Singalandela kuphela lokho esichayeke kukho.
GLOBAL.ANNUAL_REGISTRATION_FEE: {{ currentYear }} Imali Yonyaka Yokubhalisa: R100 (kanye Ivaliwe)
GLOBAL.CLASSES_FOR_TODDLERS: Amakilasi EsiFulentshi Ezingane Ezisacathula (Iminyaka engu-3â€“6) endaweni ejwayelekile yesikole sabo.
GLOBAL.LEARNING_MODELS: Izingane ezisacathula zizokwazi ukusebenzisana nezinzwa ezinhlanu, zibambe ngekhanda ulwazimagama, ziqonde futhi zisho imisho emifushane.
GLOBAL.PROGRAM_METHODS: Uhlelo lwethu lukhuthaza izingane zakho ezincane ukuthi zithole ulimi Dlala, Imidlalo, Izingoma, Umdanso kanye Nobuciko-kanye- imisebenzi yezandla.
GLOBAL.TERM_FEE: {{ currentYear }} Inkokhelo Yesikhathi: R895 I-Pro rata (Njalo Ezinyangeni Ezi-3)
GLOBAL.WHATSAPP_MESSAGE: Sawubona lapho, nginentshisekelo yokubhalisa izingane zami
GLOBAL.WHAT_TODDLERS_DO: Izingane ezisacathula zifunde, zihleke, futhi zidlale ngesiFulentshi!!
OUR_PROGRAM.CREATING_PARAGRAPH: Izingane ezisacathula zizodala umsebenzi wobuciko obonakalayo ukuze zibuyekeze imibala nemimo.
OUR_PROGRAM.MOVING_PARAGRAPH: Izingane ezisacathula zizolandela ukunyakaza okuhleliwe ukuze zihlobanise amagama nokunyakaza.
OUR_PROGRAM.READING_PARAGRAPH: Abafundisi bazofunda izindaba nezinkondlo ezixhumene nesilulumagama.
OUR_PROGRAM.SINGING_PARAGRAPH: Izingane ezisacathula zizomunca umculo wolimi ngezingoma.
OUR_PROGRAM.SPEAKING_PARAGRAPH: Amakhono ezingxoxo agcizelelwa ngemibuzo evamile kanye nesilulumagama samasonto onke.
